name: Starter for BU16

events.config: <?lua --[[@cb]] if note_direction=='up'then p1=starting_note+self:ind()%4-self:ind()//4*4 else p1=starting_note-12+self:ind()end;self:bma(note_velocity)local num,val,ch=self:ind(),self:bva(),default_channel;if toggle_mode==true then self:bmo(1)cmd=176 else self:bmo(0)cmd=144 end;if toggle_mode==true then if self:bst()>0 then gms(ch,cmd,p1,val)end else gms(ch,cmd,p1,val)end;glp(num,1,val) ?>

<?lua --[[@cb]] if note_direction=='up'then p1=starting_note+self:ind()%4-self:ind()//4*4 else p1=starting_note-12+self:ind()end;self:bma(note_velocity)local num,val,ch=self:ind(),self:bva(),default_channel;if toggle_mode==true then self:bmo(1)cmd=176 else self:bmo(0)cmd=144 end;if toggle_mode==true then if self:bst()>0 then gms(ch,cmd,p1,val)end else gms(ch,cmd,p1,val)end;glp(num,1,val) ?>
